name: ai-agent-platform
description: AI Agent Platform - AWS 10,000 AIdeas Competition Entry

scripts.prerelease: pnpm run version:validate && pnpm run version:secrets
scripts.postrelease: pnpm run version:changelog && pnpm run version:sync
scripts.release: pnpm run prerelease && pnpm run lint && pnpm run type-check && pnpm run build && pnpm run postrelease && pnpm run push:release
scripts.release:patch: pnpm run version:patch && pnpm run release
scripts.release:minor: pnpm run version:minor && pnpm run release
scripts.release:major: pnpm run version:major && pnpm run release
scripts.release:prerelease: pnpm run version:prerelease && pnpm run release
scripts.release:landing: pnpm run prerelease && pnpm --filter @ai-agent-platform/landing release && pnpm run postrelease && pnpm run push:release
scripts.release:docs: pnpm run prerelease && pnpm --filter @tlao/docs release && pnpm run postrelease && pnpm run push:release
scripts.release:landing:patch: pnpm run version:patch && pnpm run release:landing
scripts.release:landing:minor: pnpm run version:minor && pnpm run release:landing
scripts.release:landing:major: pnpm run version:major && pnpm run release:landing
scripts.release:docs:patch: pnpm run version:patch && pnpm run release:docs
scripts.release:docs:minor: pnpm run version:minor && pnpm run release:docs
scripts.release:docs:major: pnpm run version:major && pnpm run release:docs
scripts.pre-commit: pnpm run version:validate && pnpm run lint
